message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $100, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Would you be interested in buying the product at that price?
